price: Assim foi. E, com efeito, abarcávamos, em conhecimento, tudo o que ele possuía.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
